edu.xtec.jclic.project

Class ProjectFileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.project.ProjectFileUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceBridge

    public class ProjectFileUtils
extends Object
implements ResourceBridge
    Miscellaneous utilities to process ".jclic.zip" files, normalizing media file names, avoiding links to other "zip" files and extracting contents to a given folder.
    Author:
    fbusquet

      Searchs for links to ".jclic.zip" files in the given JDOM element.

    • Field Detail

      • interrupt

        public static boolean interrupt

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectFileUtils

        public ProjectFileUtils(String fileName,
                String basePath)
                 throws Exception
        Builds a ProjectFileUtils object, initializing a @link{JClicProject}
        Parameters:
        fileName - - Relative or absolute path to the ".jclic.zip" file to be processed
        basePath - - Base path of this project. Relative paths are based on this one. When null, the parent folder of fileName will be used.
        Throws:
        Exception

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeFileNames

        public void normalizeFileNames(PrintStream ps)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Normalizes the file names of the media bag, restricting it to URL-safe characters.
        Parameters:
        ps - - The @link{PrintStream} where progress messages will be outputed. Can be null.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • avoidZipLinks

        public void avoidZipLinks(PrintStream ps)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Searchs for links to ".jclic.zip" files in @link{ActiveBox} and @link{JumpInfo} objects, and redirects it to ".jclic" files
        Parameters:
        ps - - The @link{PrintStream} where progress messages will be outputed. Can be null.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • avoidZipLinksInJumpInfo

        public void avoidZipLinksInJumpInfo(JumpInfo ji,
                           PrintStream ps)
                             throws InterruptedException
        Searchs for ".jclic.zip" links in JumpInfo elements, changing it to links to plain ".jclic" files.
        Parameters:
        ji - - The JumpInfo to scan for links
        ps - - The @link{PrintStream} where progress messages will be outputed. Can be null.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • avoidZipLinksInElement

        public void avoidZipLinksInElement(Element el,
                          PrintStream ps)
                            throws InterruptedException
        Searchs for links to ".jclic.zip" files in the given JDOM element. This method makes recursive calls on all the child elements of the provided starting point.
        Parameters:
        el - - The org.jdom.Element to scan for links
        ps - - The @link{PrintStream} where progress messages will be outputed. Can be null.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

        public String getRelativeFn(String fName)

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(String path,
          Collection<String> fileList,
          PrintStream ps)
            throws Exception,
                   InterruptedException
        Saves the JClic project and all its contents in plain format (not zipped) into the specified path
        Parameters:
        path - - The path where the project will be saved
        ps - - The @link{PrintStream} where progress messages will be outputed. Can be null.
        Throws:
        Exception
        InterruptedException
